#bytecode

= Introduction =

a function in Neoe-VM is a list of command code and a set of variables.
variable count for a function is determined at compile time.
functions can be executed serially(RUNPROC) or parallel(STARTPROC).
also has PROCJOIN.
variable can be accesses across functions using GETPROCVAL and SETPROCVAL.


= Details =

R means register(local variable), I means instant value.
